divs: Sighting DetailsI didn't realize it was there while taking this picture but noticed it about a month later while reviewing my pics for editing and filing. These pics are a copy of the original and enlargements out of the original. The original pic taken with a Nikon Coolpix 8700. I wish I could say more about this sighting.
Summary: I didn't realize it was there but noticed it about a month later while reviewing my pics.
